basics.name: Jasper Van
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Jasper is an experienced engineer with over a decade in computer programming and the past seven years focused on cloud-native. He is highly proficient in key platforms such as Kubernetes, Istio, Argo, and Knative. A dedicated contributor to several open source projects and a member of both the Istio and Kubernetes communities, Jasper is passionate about the open source movement and is committed to its collaborative spirit and innovation.

work.name: Li Auto Inc.
work.summary: Spearheaded the development and infrastructure of the company's internal function platform, handling over 10,000 functions with a peak QPS of 300,000. Engineered a container platform utilizing ArgoCD, which facilitated the management and operations of dozens of components across hundreds of Kubernetes clusters.

work.name: Igetget Co., Ltd
work.summary: Spearheaded the design and development of a proprietary API gateway, seamlessly handling a peak of 250,000 QPS and managing thousands of millions of daily requests. Masterfully developed the data plane autonomously, showcasing expertise in proxy technology at both L4 and L7 layers.

projects.name: Kiae
projects.description: An open-source cloud platform completely based on Kubernetes and Istio. Alternative to Heroku / Vercel / Railway
highlights: Leveraging a decade of experience, designed a developer-friendly cloud platform tailored to meet modern needs.
Supports multi-language development, including Go, Python, Node.js, Java, and PHP.
Supports multi-cloud deployment, including AWS, GCP, Azure, and self-hosting.
SSO Integration (OIDC, OAuth2, LDAP, SAML 2.0, GitHub, GitLab, Microsoft, LinkedIn)

projects.name: ZPan
projects.description: A self-hosted cloud drive base on the cloud storage. Alternative to Google Drive / Dropbox / OneDrive
highlights: Supports high-speed uploading and downloading without limited by server bandwidth
Support all cloud storage compatible with S3 protocol
Support file & folder management and sharing
Support document preview and audio and video playback
